name: Ezra  (Cold War)
content:
Ezra was a female Human who lived on the planet Nal Hutta with her husband Rand in their later life. Rand was employed at the Rust Yards, and the two lived in the nearby worker settlement. They once asked a passerby to retrieve and recharge used power units in the Rust Yards so that the couple could trade them for food.
Rand and Ezra appear in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they give players the mission "Industrial Raiders" on Hutta.
